metadata.title: CVE-2024-38573 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:cppc_cpufreq: Fix possible null pointer dereference cppc_cpufreq_get_rate()and hisi_cppc_cpufreq_get_rate() can be called from different places withvarious parameters. So cpufreq_cpu_get() can return null as 'policy' insome circumstances. Fix this bug by adding null return check. Found byLinux Verification Center (linuxtesting.org) with SVACE.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
